00034 #include "par_partition.h"

00039 #include "partition.h"
00040 #include "mpi_bindings.h"

00042 //#define DEBUG
00043 
00044 using namespace std;
00045 
00046 namespace cluster {
00047   
00048   par_partition::par_partition(MPI_Comm _comm) : comm(_comm) { }
00049 
00050   par_partition::~par_partition() { }
00051 
00052 
00053   void par_partition::gather(partition& destination, int root) {
00054     int rank, size;
00055     CMPI_Comm_rank(comm, &rank);
00056     CMPI_Comm_size(comm, &size);
00057     
00058 #ifdef DEBUG
00059     size_t count = medoid_ids.size();
00060     CMPI_Bcast(&count, 1, MPI_SIZE_T, root, comm);
00061     if (count != medoid_ids.size()) {
00062       cerr << "Error: incorrect number of medoids on " << rank << ": " << medoid_ids.size() 
00063            << ", expected " << count << endl;
00064       exit(1);
00065     }
00066     
00067     size_t object_count = cluster_ids.size();
00068     CMPI_Bcast(&object_count, 1, MPI_SIZE_T, root, comm);    
00069     if (object_count != cluster_ids.size()) {
00070       cerr << "Error: incorrect number of objects on " << rank << ": " << cluster_ids.size() 
00071            << ", expected " << object_count << endl;
00072       exit(1);
00073     }
00074 
00075     std::vector<object_id> bcast_medoid_ids = medoid_ids;
00076     CMPI_Bcast(&bcast_medoid_ids[0], bcast_medoid_ids.size(), MPI_SIZE_T, root, comm);
00077     for (size_t i=0; i < medoid_ids.size(); i++) {
00078       if (medoid_ids[i] != bcast_medoid_ids[i]) {
00079         cerr << "Error: medoids do not match on " << rank << endl;
00080         exit(1);
00081       }
00082     }
00083 #endif // DEBUG
00084     
00085     if (rank == root) {
00086       destination.medoid_ids = medoid_ids;
00087       destination.cluster_ids.resize(cluster_ids.size() * size);
00088     }
00089 
00090     CMPI_Gather(&cluster_ids[0],             cluster_ids.size(), MPI_SIZE_T,
00091                 &destination.cluster_ids[0], cluster_ids.size(), MPI_SIZE_T, 
00092                 root, comm);
00093   }
00094 
00095 
00096   void par_partition::get_sizes(std::vector<size_t>& sizes) {
00097     vector<size_t> local_sizes(medoid_ids.size(), 0);
00098     for (size_t i=0; i < cluster_ids.size(); i++) {
00099       local_sizes[cluster_ids[i]]++;
00100     }
00101     
00102     sizes.resize(medoid_ids.size());
00103     CMPI_Allreduce(&local_sizes[0], &sizes[0], medoid_ids.size(), MPI_SIZE_T, MPI_SUM, comm); 
00104   }
00105 
00106 
00107 
00108   std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& out, const par_partition& par) {
00109     cluster::partition p;
00110     p.medoid_ids = par.medoid_ids;
00111     p.cluster_ids = par.cluster_ids;
00112     out << p;
00113     return out;
00114   }
